div.p: Group 2 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ResearchSubject|5.0.0 to Extensions for Using Data Elements from FHIR R5 in FHIR R4

tr.td: Note that the target element context `ResearchSubject.status` is a modifier element, so this extension does not need to be defined as a modifier. Element `ResearchSubject.progress` has a context of ResearchSubject based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `ResearchSubject`.
